text: Oleksandr Svitlychniy (born 23 August 1972) is a Ukrainian gymnast. He won a bronze medal at the 1996 Summer Olympics, and a silver medal at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Ukraine Category:Gymnasts at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Ukraine Category:Olympic silver medalists for Ukraine Category:Sportspeople from Kharkiv
title: Oleksandr Svitlychniy
